classes.name: SQLDatabaseManager
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations for database objects.

methods.name: addDatabase
methods.description: Adds a database object to the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: updateDatabase
methods.description: Updates the specified database in the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: removeDatabase
methods.description: Removes a database object from the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: getDatabases
methods.description: Returns the list of database objects in the plug-in's inventory.

methods.name: getDatabase
methods.description: Returns the database object from the plug-in's inventory with a specified name.

methods.name: getDatabaseById
methods.description: Returns the database object from the plug-in's inventory with a specified ID.

methods.name: validateDatabase
methods.description: Validates the created databse object if it is able to connect to the real database.

methods.name: getSupportedDatabaseTypes
methods.description: Returns a list of supported database types.

methods.name: addTablesToDatabase
methods.description: Adds new tables to a database.

methods.name: removeTableFromDatabase
methods.description: Removes a specified table from a database.

methods.name: generateCreateWorkflow
methods.parameters: table: SQLTable, category: any, overwriteWorkflow: boolean, readOnlyColumns: SQLColumn[]
methods.description: Generates a forkflow for creation of database record.

methods.name: generateReadWorkflow
methods.parameters: table: SQLTable, category: any, overwriteWorkflow: boolean
methods.description: Generates a forkflow that reads table records.

methods.name: generateDeleteWorkflow
methods.parameters: table: SQLTable, category: any, overwriteWorkflow: boolean
methods.description: Generates a forkflow that deletes table records.

methods.name: generateUpdateWorkflow
methods.parameters: table: SQLTable, category: any, overwriteWorkflow: boolean, readOnlyColumns: SQLColumn[]
methods.description: Generates a forkflow that updates a table record.

methods.name: convertBooleanForPresentation
methods.description: Converts boolean values to 'Yes' or 'No' strings.

methods.name: getConnectionUrl
methods.description: Returns connection URL pattern for a particular database type.

methods.name: isValidNumberOrEmpty
methods.description: Returns 'true' if the passed object is a valid number or null. Otherwise, returns 'false'.

methods.name: createRecord
methods.description: Creates a new active record with primary fields.

methods.name: readRecords
methods.description: Reads records by certain search criteria.

methods.name: findUniqueRecord
methods.description: Finds a record by certain search criteria.

methods.name: updateRecord
methods.description: Updates the record that matches the primary key fields.

methods.name: deleteRecords
methods.description: Deletes a record by certain search criteria.

methods.name: getColumns
methods.description: Get all table columns.

methods.name: getUnmappedTableNames
methods.description: Returns a list of tables, not added to this database.

methods.name: getMappedTableNames
methods.description: Returns a list of tables, that are added to this database.

methods.name: getAllTableNames
methods.description: Returns a list of all tables, that are in this database.

methods.name: getTables
methods.description: Returns a list of tables in this database.

methods.name: readCustomQuery
methods.description: Executes a read custom query on the database and returns the results in an ActiveRecord array

methods.name: executeCustomQuery
methods.description: Execute non-read custom query on the database

methods.name: getProperty
methods.description: Returns the value of the given property.

methods.name: getFieldNames
methods.description: Returns record field names.

methods.name: getConnection
methods.parameters: url: string, username: string, password: string
methods.description:
Return a connection on a Database connection
((String)url,(String)username,(String)password)

methods.name: createStatement
methods.description:
Creates a Statement object for sending SQL statements
to the database

methods.name: prepareStatement
methods.description:
Creates a PreparedStatement object for sending
parameterized SQL statements to the database

methods.name: prepareCall
methods.description:
Creates a CallableStatement object for calling
database stored procedures

methods.name: close
methods.description:
Releases this Connection object's database and JDBC
resources

classes.name: PreparedStatement
classes.description: An object that represents a precompiled SQL statement

methods.name: execute
methods.description:
Executes the SQL statement in this PreparedStatement
object, which may be any kind of SQL statement.
Some prepared
statements return multiple results; the execute method
handles
these complex statements as well as the simpler form of
statements
handled by the methods executeQuery and executeUpdate.
The execute
method returns a boolean to indicate the form of the
first result.
You must call either the method getResultSet or getUpdateCount to
retrieve the result; you must call getMoreResults to move to any
subsequent result(s).

methods.name: executeQuery
methods.description:
Executes the SQL query in this PreparedStatement
object and returns the ResultSet object generated by the query.

methods.name: executeUpdate
setString
methods.description:
Sets the designated parameter to the given String
value.

methods.name: setDate
methods.description: Sets the designated parameter to the given Date value.

methods.name: setTimestamp
methods.description:
Sets the designated parameter to the given Timestamp
value.

methods.name: setNull
methods.description: Sets the designated parameter to db null.

methods.name: registerOutParameter
methods.description: Registers the OUT parameter in ordinal position parameterIndex to the JDBC type sqlType.

methods.name: getInt
methods.description:
Retrieves the value of the designated JDBC INTEGER parameter as an int in the Java programming language.
Not present in the API documentation

methods.name: getString
methods.description:
Retrieves the value of the designated JDBC CHAR, VARCHAR, or LONGVARCHAR parameter as a String in the Java programming language.
Not present in the API documentation

methods.name: next
methods.description:
Moves the cursor down one row from its current
position.
A ResultSet cursor is initially positioned before the
first row;
the first call to the method next makes the first row
the current
row; the second call makes the second row the current
row, and so
on.
Return true if the new current row is valid; false
if there are no more
rows

methods.name: previous
methods.description:
Moves the cursor to the previous row in this ResultSet
object. Returns true if the cursor is on a valid row; false if it
is off the result set

methods.name: beforeFirst
methods.description:
Moves the cursor to the front of this ResultSet
object, just before the first row. This method has no effect if
the result set contains no rows.

methods.name: first
methods.description:
Moves the cursor to the first row in this ResultSet
object and returns true if the cursor is on a valid row; false if
there are no rows in the result set
This method can not be use because you can not set the properties
to set up the JDBC connection using the vro SQL Plugin.

methods.name: last
methods.description:
Moves the cursor to the last row in this ResultSet
object and returns true if the cursor is on a valid row; false if
there are no rows in the result set

methods.name: afterLast
methods.description:
Moves the cursor to the end of this ResultSet object,
just after the last row. This method has no effect if the result
set contains no rows.
This method can not be use because you can not set the properties
to set up the JDBC connection using the vro SQL Plugin.

methods.name: wasNull
methods.description:
Reports whether the last column read had a value of
SQL NULL

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Return the String value of the given column name

methods.name: getStringAt
methods.description: Return the String value of the given column index

methods.name: getNumber
methods.description: Return the Number value of the given column name

methods.name: getNumberAt
methods.description: Return the Number value of the given column index

methods.name: getDate
methods.description: Return the Date value of the given column name

methods.name: getDateAt
methods.description: Return the Date value of the given column index

methods.name: getTimestamp
methods.description: Return the Timestamp value of the given column name

methods.name: getTimestampAt
methods.description: Return the Timestamp value of the given column index

methods.name: getMetaData
methods.description: Return the meta data of this ResultSet

methods.name: getColumnCount
methods.description: Get the number of columns in this ResultSet

methods.name: getColumnName
methods.description:
Get the name of the column at position index (starting
with 1)

methods.name: getTableName
methods.description: Gets the designated column's table name.
